TABLE.NAME: local_securitypatcher
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains all the security patches data.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the provided security patch

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of the patch 0: no actions performed, 1: applied, 2: restored.

FIELD.NAME: timeapplied
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the security patch was applied.

FIELD.NAME: timerestored
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the security patch was restored.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the security patch was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the record data was modified.

TABLE.NAME: local_securitypatcher_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains all the security patches report data.

FIELD.NAME: patchid
FIELD.COMMENT: The security patch who belongs this report.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the report. Success: 0, Error: 1.

FIELD.NAME: operation
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the security patch operation.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the security patch report was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the report data was modified.
